import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import { SignInUser } from '../services/Auth' const SignIn = ({ setUser }) => { let navigate = useNavigate() const startState = { email: '', password: '' } const [formState, setFormState] = useState(startState) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormState({ ...formState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const payload = await SignInUser(formState) await setUser(payload) setFormState(startState) navigate('/') } return (

New user?

) } export default SignIn
